ACTIVITY.TITLE: Activity
ACTIVITY.SUBTITLE: Network Address Translation (NAT) with Overload - PAT

STEP.DESCRIPTION:
Drag the correct IP Address/Port combination and place into the NAT translation table. Host-A and Host-B are both communicating with the WWW server and Router-A is using PAT by way of the serial interface IP address.
When done, click the Check button.

ACTIVITY.MESSAGE:
Congratulations, this activity has
been successfully completed.
